item.title: Using Slack for Server Development
item.description: I recently found a surprisingly helpful approach for server-side development which uses Slack in a creative way. The Problem The scenario can be roughly simplified to this: We are building a mobile app and application server. This will take data from a user, transform it and then pass it to the enterprise system processing. The problem is that the enterprise system doesn't exist yet! Now this is not too much of a challenge, the first thing we did was build a simple mock of the enterprise system in Node.
